Reviews.Title: “A tad expensive for the rooms but service was better than average”

Reviews.Content: booked minute hotel people recommended budget spend honest basic average worth 250 sg paid change upgraded premier nice appreciate service offer service concierge front desk waiter staff excellent concorde team outstanding helped beyond call duty unfortunately breakfast adequate top decent pool probably cleaning person waiter pool annoyingly pushy trying sell drinks overall fantastic staff met downsides
